title: Guest Requests Room Cleaning
description: A guest calls down to the front desk to request that their room be cleaned while they are out for the afternoon.

tasks.description: Identify the guest's room number and confirm their request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the guest and their room number.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority cleaning task in the housekeeping management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs a priority task for the specified room.

tasks.description: Assign the task to the housekeeper responsible for that floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task is dispatched to the correct staff member's handheld device.
